titles.title: CB 111 Blessed Be the Lord God

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
BLESSED BE THE LORD GOD,
The God of Israel. Blessed be the Lord God, the
God of Israel, who only doeth wondrous things,
who only doeth wondrous things. Blessed be His
glorious name forever.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Let the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen,
amen, amen, amen.
(Repeat first verse)
